list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a visible suspension of carbon or other particles in air, typically one emitted from a burning substance.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đang chết vì một làn khói

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: heat the oil until it just smokes
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đun nóng dầu cho đến khi nó chỉ hút thuốc

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: suck on the end of a lit cigarette, cigar, pipe, etc. so as to inhale and exhale the smoke produced by the burning tobacco into the mouth.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she was sitting at the kitchen table smoking
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô đang ngồi ở bàn bếp hút thuốc

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: treat, fumigate, or cleanse by exposure to smoke.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we baited her and smoked her
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi mồi cho cô ấy và hút cô ấy
